plot: Ben runs across his little league team as they face in a playoff against a team of robots in juvenile disguise targeting the President of the United States.

While in Williamsport, PA, Ben comes across his school's baseball team, the Cannons, in the little league world series finals against an unusually superior team. Though in conflict due to school bullies Cash and JT being on the team, Ben uses XLR8 to secretly help the Cannons defeat the Squires, not realizing at first that the other team is as remarkably good as it is because they're robots, with a plot against the baseball-fan President of the United States.—statmanjeff
